questions.question: What does Jess do after he finds out that Leslie is dead?

choices.answer: He goes to bed
He begins to cry
He goes to her house
He runs down the road to get away

questions.question: When Jess wakes up in the morning, what is going through his head?

choices.answer: He thinks that everything was just a bad dream
He wonders how he will be able to talk to Bill and Judy now
He wonders how they will bury Leslie
He wonders if he will ever go back to Terabithia

questions.question: Why aren't his parents mad at him for milking Miss Bessie?

choices.answer: His sisters offer to do the job
They are sympathetic towards what he is going through
They know that he will do it eventually
They didn't need the milk at the time

questions.question: Why does his mom make Jess pancakes?

choices.answer: She always makes him pancakes
Jess asked for pancakes for breakfast
She feels bad and hopes they will somehow cheer him up
They were Leslie's favorite food

questions.question: Why does Brenda yell at Jess?

choices.answer: Because he ate all the pancakes and left none for her
Because he scared the family when they couldn't find him
Because she thinks it's his fault that Leslie is dead
Because she thinks that he doesn't care that Leslie is dead

questions.question: How does Jess respond when his dad says they should go pay respects to the family?

choices.answer: He asks who his dad is talking about
He agrees
He refuses
He finally starts to cry
